text: Greed breaks the sack. To prove this, I can only use the example of the Chicken, which the Apologist says laid golden eggs. Her owner thought she had a treasure inside her body; he killed her, dismembered her, and found her entirely the same as the other Chickens. That's how he lost his fortune. Good lesson for greedy people! In these times, how many have we seen who, wanting to get rich overnight, have run out of a coin! FIN
title: La Gallina de los huevos de oro
author: Jean de La Fontaine
